channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; The Big Hill: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hippies; Bug Hotel: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly's Magic Wand: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Springtime: Springtime in the Little Kingdom brings out tulips, daffodils, hedgehogs. and two very hungry gnomes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes To School: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo! (S3, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam tries to blend in with a tough clan of hyenas in 'The Undercover Hyena', and in 'The Stranger in the Burrow', underground creatures start getting spooked by the burrow's new addition. (S1, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Snow, Sea, Sky, Race: Blaze and Crusher face off in an off-road showdown. The trucks must speed through the snow, swim through the sea, and soar to a finish line in the sky! (S8, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Dress Up Chest: Gabby and Pandy go on a dress-up adventure in the dollhouse, wearing different costumes to help the Gabby Cats get out of some sticky situations. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Clumsy and Dimwitty want to help cure 'Rowena's Plant', then in 'What a Doll', Rowena decides to turn Vanity and Storm into dolls to play with. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Scaredy Smurf would like a dragon in 'I Want a Dragon', then in 'Magic Meltdown', an abandoned cauldron takes revenge. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger in 'Pups Save a Blimp', and then in 'Pups Save the Chili Cook-Off', Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger's reflector causes a bridge to burn in 'Pups vs. The Hum-Flector', then in 'Pups Save a Capybara', the Paw Patrol rescues Winnie and a capybara. (S10, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny trek through the rainforest to deliver a cake in 'Tres Leches Trouble', then in 'Wizzle Wozzle Woo', Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Hotel: When Gabby unboxes a suitcase and a hotel brochure, it's time to take a trip to The Dollhouse Hotel! (S1, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Games; Flying Discs: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Kiddie Workout; Little Cars: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Ant Farm: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard The Elf Pirate: Barnaby Elf's uncle, Redbeard the Elf Pirate, comes to visit the Little Kingdom, but he has lost his treasure. Everyone must help Redbeard track down the treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef and Olly make snacks for Morton in 'Granola Bars', then in 'Nachos', Bonzo cooks with Chef for the first time. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: An old prospector triggers a gold rush in Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save a Goldrush', and then in 'Pups Save the Paw Patroller', Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew drives the Paw Patroller away.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull is Getting Married: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day! (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus; Movie Night: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day; Wildflower Wood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Fruit Harvest: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Greenhouse: Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog are showing and sharing their lovely, tomato filled, Greenhouses to Peppa and George.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sailing Boat: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Masks: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children; making masks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Molly Mole: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: No one's food is safe in 'The Forest Food Bandit', then in 'The Case of the Absent Giraffe', Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Underground Chicken: The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Duck Pond: When water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find out what's happening.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger's festival shakes up Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save Fogstock', then in 'Pups Save the Stage Actor', Francois starts a production. (S11, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm drops hailstones that hatch into baby space rocks in 'Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks', and in 'Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys', a 3D printer leads to pranks all over Adventure Bay. (S9, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Big Announcement; House Rules: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid! (S7, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Grumples make 'Troll Jelly', and then in 'Catch That Kitty', Dora recovers the artifact El Gatito Magico. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Scaredy Smurf would like a dragon in 'I Want a Dragon', then in 'Magic Meltdown', an abandoned cauldron takes revenge. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Baby Box's Meow-Seum Day!: Gabby and Pandy help the Gabby Cats create unique pieces of artwork in preparation for Baby Box's highly anticipated Meow-seum Day! (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Video Game Land - A Monster Machine Super Special - Part 2: Blaze and Crusher must beat Video Game Land's four epic levels to return home! (S8, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Francois' pants catch on fire in 'Pups Save the Flaming Flounder', then in 'Pups Make the News', a news crew is in town when Chickaletta accidentally causes a fire in new parkette. (S11, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A fire breaks out in 'Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday', then in 'Pups Save A S'more-Mergency', Humdinger goes camping, and has just one thing on his mind. (S11, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Windmills: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when Mr. Bull arrives to do some noisy work - he is building a windmill, to make electricity! The children join in and make their own windmills too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Club House: Mr Bull builds a brand-new club house and slide for Peppa and her friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Funny Music; Stone Age Granny: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Trampolines; A Day With Doctor Hamster: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Police Car; Viking Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Tadpoles: Holly takes some frogspawn home from class to look after, but is surprised when the frogspawn turns into tadpoles overnight. Soon there are lots of little frogs for Holly to look after.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose in 'Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger', then in 'Pups Save A Royal Painting', Sweetie tries to replace a painting of the Princess. (S8, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Travelling Travis finds a mysterious creature in troublein 'Pups Save a Humsquatch', and in 'Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc', a robo-toy causes mayhem, but Ryder knows just who to call! (S6, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Baby Box's Meow-Seum Day!: Gabby and Pandy help the Gabby Cats create unique pieces of artwork in preparation for Baby Box's highly anticipated Meow-seum Day! (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Secrets; The Playgroup: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Pig's Chickens; Champion Daddy Pig: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Flying Vet; The Zoo: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Long Grass: Daddy Pig has not cut the lawn for ages and the grass has grown very long.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Kylie Kangaroo: Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Justa is still searching for his calling in 'The Talented Justa Smurf', then in 'Smurf, Yes Smurf!', Brainy uses a potion to finally get the Village to obey his every whim. (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the Grumples make 'Troll Jelly', and then in 'Catch That Kitty', Dora recovers the artifact El Gatito Magico. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble's cousin visits Adventure Bay in 'Charger Visits the Pups', and then in 'Pups Save a Shiny Ride', Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a contest. (S9, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger disguises himself to steal a purple pearl in 'Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger', then in 'Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patroller', Moby swipes the Whale Patroller - and the Pups' vehicles! (S9, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help the Mayor go skydiving in 'The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Centre', then in 'The Crew Builds A Roller Rink', Wheeler and Truffles try some new wheels. (S2, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Paramedic Power: When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day! (S7, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Game Show: It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! CatRat leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Abuela win the Great Abuela Cook-off in 'The Great Abuela Cookoff', and in 'Missing Map', Dora finds Map after a game of Hide-and-Seek. (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al's animals go missing when 'Pups Save a Sleepover', and then in 'Pups Save the Carnival', Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival and the prizes have gone missing too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party: At Chloe's party, the children and grownups struggle to finish the obstacle course to reach the prize. George is the last to try and finds the birthday cake! (S7, ep 27).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Competition; Adventure Caravan: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.
